trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Lakewood
There was one other sighting in Lakewood on or around November 9th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading east on Alameda Ave.in Lakewood. CO., driving home from work when I looked up into the sky facing east. I saw what looked like a large red fire ball falling from the sky, I almost wrecked my car cause I thought a plane or helicopter was going down. Then I looked again and the fire ball split apart into 8 flying objects that were all lit up and they flew together across the sky, but not in a row but in a triangle formation and then they were gone that fast. Maybe they were fighters planes but I have never seen that may at once together. I definetly felt they were chasing something that fell from the sky. I checked the news but have heard nothing, thanks, what an awsome experience whatever it was.
